properties.name: repository.technology
properties.description: The technology to use for repository implementation (mongo, couchbase, etc.).

properties.name: openapi.oAuthFlow.url
properties.description: Base URL for OAuth flow in OpenAPI documentation.

properties.name: openapi.oAuthFlow.tokenUrl
properties.description: OAuth token URL for OpenAPI documentation.

properties.name: openapi.oAuthFlow.authorizationUrl
properties.description: OAuth authorization URL for OpenAPI documentation.

properties.name: openapi.oAuthFlow.refreshUrl
properties.description: OAuth refresh token URL for OpenAPI documentation.
